\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMGDGE/Communication+Channels+and+Rules+for+Georgia\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Communication Channels and Rules for Georgia\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To follow the news in the location, join the MS Teams chat \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://teams.microsoft.com/l/team/19%3a7d849a88499f49baafb3ce07427155ad%40thread.tacv2/conversations?groupId=6be6fffc-7c62-4532-86d8-66bcf236c820&tenantId=b41b72d0-4e9f-4c26-8a69-f949f367c91d\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Georgia\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Also, you can find all updates in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Georgia News Digest\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Georgia Benefits Digest\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Check out internal courses in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"L&D Collection Digest\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please revise your mailbox settings so you don't miss them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To find the local or technical community you like, follow the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://wearecommunity.io/communities?f%5B0%5D%5Blocation%5D%5B%5D=Georgia&f%5B0%5D%5Blocation%5D%5B%5D=Georgia%2C%20T%27bilisi&f%5B0%5D%5Blocation%5D%5B%5D=Georgia%2C%20Tbilisi\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
